issue.title: [C++] Reduce code size in arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_compare.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17135](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17135). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I had noticed the large symbol sizes in scalar_compare.cc when looking at the shared library. I had a quick hack on the plane to try to reduce the code size

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17135?focusedCommentId=17569162) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13654
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13654>
